content: fast easy fun exciting - designed by juan the yarn addict materials used red heart super saver ombre hot sauce approximately 2000 yards for a throw sized blanket 6mm crochet hook feel free to use any yarn of your choice following the recommended hook size for the yarn chosen abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet skip skip space - space st s stitch/stitches instructions chain 4 slip to the 1st chain to form a circle chain 3 counts as a double_crochet round 1 insert 2 double_crochet in chain circle chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round important note for repeat rounds round 1 will be 1 double_crochet in every st and in the corners 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in corner chain space * insert 1 double_crochet in each st in the corner space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in the last corner space insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round round 3 chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in corner chain space * skip 1 st in the next st insert 2 double_crochet twins in a st continue placing 2 double_crochet in every other st until the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in last corner space insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round round 4 chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in the corner chain space * skip 2 sts then in the space between the sets of twins insert 2 double_crochet continue placing 2 double_crochet in every space between the sets of twins until the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in the last corner space insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round round 5 chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in the corner chain space * insert 1 double_crochet in each space between the double_crochet sts continue until the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in the last corner space 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st to close the round round 6 chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in the corner chain space * chain 1 skip 1 1 double_crochet in the next st continue chain 1 skip 1 1 double_crochet until the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner in the last corner space 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before
